column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love this place.  Any of the sangrias are great but I especially like the peach.  The staff is friendly and helpful
column3: and everything tastes amazing.  It can get pretty noisy during peak times but the food and drink make it worth it.  However
column4: if you don't have a reservation during that time
column5: don't even try to go.  The wait for those without a reservation on the weekend is always forever so do yourself a favor and hit up Open Table first!  This place is also great for large groups.
